credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Pedestal of a pilar
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Vertical rectangle. Below is a plinth. Upon it stands a wreath, supported by two winged women, sitting, with trumpets. For their posture two suggestions are made. Above it is a projecting band with "PIVS. VI. P. M" Above it are moldings and a curved frieze with festoons supported by a mask. Above it is a band with flutes. Usual background.
name: Drawing
